table.table-sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `contracts`; CREATE TABLE `contracts` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `mail` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `alias` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `content` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `tofriend` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`mail`), KEY `fk_tofriend` (`tofriend`), CONSTRAINT `fk_tofriend` FOREIGN KEY (`tofriend`) REFERENCES `user4proxy` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
